[FIXED For those reading and having the same problem, dont forget to set the IVA to the Internal Spaces layers] Edited November 19, 2015 by strykersm

[quote name='strykersm']
Im having another problem: The exterior shows up on IVA, how to I fix this?
[url]http://i.snag.gy/YIANJ.jpg[/url]
[/QUOTE]

I don't have Unity in front of me at the moment (at work), but this part I can talk about here. To my knowledge, the exterior always shows up, but ideally you want the IVA to line up with the actual windows on the exterior, so that you see the window frames in the correct places. What I've usually done is start making my IVA by starting with a copy of the exterior and working inward from the same vertices, and then hide the exterior meshes.

Hmm....not really an option now :\ Is there another way around?

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

I everything. (Gotta love the portuguese trait of getting around problems on our own). Scince im too lazy to write i'l be making a video about it :D
